desc: TGM Sport Shop Honda parts , tuning products , Motorbike parts , Car parts, Car Servicing , Car mods Racing, MOT

layout.text: Here at TGM Sport we are both a garage and a bodyshop, in addition we have a wealth of experience with track preparation. The garage is based near Fleet in Hampshire.We offer a range of garage-based services including servicing, diagnostics and air-con re gas.We can source and fit most after-market products to your vehicle. In addition to these services we have put our motor sport heads together and offer a full race-car build and preparation service for our customers.We can also help prepare your road car for trackdays.As authorised dealers for Mugen, Eibach, HKS and Spoon performance products we are able to source a wide range of both OEM and 3rd party after-market performance parts for our customers vehicles.
